tags.name: Localization keys
tags.description: Manipulates localization keys, their translations and metadata

tags.name: Big Meta
tags.description: Handles big meta (context) for translation keys. Tolgee automatically stores contextual data about keys to provide this information to Tolgee AI translator.

tags.name: Import Settings
tags.description: These endpoints enable you to store default settings for import. These settings are only used in the UI of Tolgee platform. It's also the default for stateful importing via `/v2/projects/{projectId}/import/*` API endpoints. The settings are stored per user and per project.

tags.name: Languages
tags.description: Languages

tags.name: Content Delivery
tags.description: Endpoints for Content Delivery management

tags.name: Import
tags.description: These endpoints handle multi-step data import

tags.name: API keys
tags.description: Manage Project API keys

tags.name: All localization keys
tags.description: All localization keys in the project

tags.name: User
tags.description: Manipulates currently authenticated user

tags.name: Invitations
tags.description: These endpoints manage inviting new users to projects or organizations

tags.name: Project Transferring
tags.description: These endpoints manage transferring projects to other organizations

tags.name: Tags
tags.description: Manipulates key tags

tags.name: Namespaces
tags.description: Manipulates key namespaces

tags.name: Server Administration
tags.description:
**Only for self-hosted instances** 

Managees global Tolgee Platform instance data e.g., user accounts and organizations.

tags.name: Translations
tags.description: Operations related to translations in project

tags.name: Scope Info
tags.description: Returns info about permission scopes

tags.name: Translation Comments
tags.description: Operations related to translation comments

get.description: Returns information about currently authenticated user.

put.description: Updates current user's profile information.
Updates current user's password. Invalidates all previous sessions upon success.
Enables TOTP-based two-factor authentication. Invalidates all previous sessions upon success.

delete.description: Disables TOTP-based two-factor authentication. Invalidates all previous sessions upon success.

put.description: Regenerates multi-factor authentication recovery codes
Marks guide step as completed
Sets open state of the quick start guide
Sets finished state of the quick start guide

parameters.name: scopes
parameters.description: Granted scopes

put.description: Removes user's direct project permission, explicitly set for the project. User will have now base permissions from organization or no permission if they're not organization member.

get.description: Returns languages, in which key is disabled

put.description: Sets languages, in which key is disabled
Edits key name, translations, tags, screenshots, and other data

post.description: Immediately publishes content to the configured Content Delivery

put.description: Tags a key with tag. If tag with provided name doesn't exist, it is created
Resolves translation conflict. The old translation will be overridden.
Resolves translation conflict. The old translation will be kept.
Resolves all translation conflicts for provided language. The old translations will be overridden.
Resolves all translation conflicts for provided language. The old translations will be kept.
Sets existing language to pair with language to import. Data will be imported to selected existing language when applied.
Resets existing language paired with language to import.
Sets namespace for file to import.
Imports the data prepared in previous step

parameters.name: forceMode
parameters.description: Whether override or keep all translations with unresolved conflicts

get.description: Returns import settings for the authenticated user and the project.

put.description: Stores import settings for the authenticated user and the project.
Stops batch opperation if possible.
Set's "outdated" flag indicating the base translation was changed without updating current translation.
Removes "auto translated" indication

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor to get next data

parameters.name: filterState
parameters.description:
Translation state in the format: languageTag,state. You can use this parameter multiple times.

When used with multiple states for same language it is applied with logical OR. 
 
When used with multiple languages, it is applied with logical AND.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description:
Languages to be contained in response.
                
To add multiple languages, repeat this param (eg. ?languages=en&languages=de)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: String to search in key name or translation text

parameters.name: filterKeyName
parameters.description: Selects key with provided names. Use this param multiple times to fetch more keys.

parameters.name: filterKeyId
parameters.description: Selects key with provided ID. Use this param multiple times to fetch more keys.

parameters.name: filterUntranslatedAny
parameters.description: Selects only keys, where translation is missing in any language

parameters.name: filterTranslatedAny
parameters.description: Selects only keys, where translation is provided in any language

parameters.name: filterUntranslatedInLang
parameters.description: Selects only keys, where translation is missing in specified language

parameters.name: filterTranslatedInLang
parameters.description: Selects only keys, where translation is provided in specified language

parameters.name: filterHasScreenshot
parameters.description: Selects only keys with screenshots

parameters.name: filterHasNoScreenshot
parameters.description: Selects only keys without screenshots

parameters.name: filterNamespace
parameters.description:
Filter namespaces. 

To filter default namespace, set to empty string.

parameters.name: filterTag
parameters.description: Selects only keys with provided tag

parameters.name: filterOutdatedLanguage
parameters.description: Selects only keys, where translation in provided langs is in outdated state

parameters.name: filterNotOutdatedLanguage
parameters.description: Selects only keys, where translation in provided langs is not in outdated state

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

post.description: Pre-translate provided keys to provided languages by TM.
Translate provided keys to provided languages through primary MT provider.
Copy translation values from one language to other languages.
Clear translation values for provided keys in selected languages.
Prepares provided files to import.

parameters.name: structureDelimiter
parameters.description: When importing structured JSONs, you can set the delimiter which will be used in names of improted keys.

parameters.name: supportArrays
parameters.description: If true, for structured formats (like JSON) arrays are supported. e.g. Array object like {"hello": ["item1", "item2"]} will be imported as keys hello[0] = "item1" and hello[1] = "item2".

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description:
Languages to be contained in export.
                
If null, all languages are exported

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format to export to

parameters.name: structureDelimiter
parameters.description:
Delimiter to structure file content. 

e.g. For key "home.header.title" would result in {"home": {"header": "title": {"Hello"}}} structure.

When null, resulting file won't be structured. Works only for generic structured formats (e.g. JSON, YAML), 
specific formats like `YAML_RUBY` don't honor this parameter.

parameters.name: filterKeyId
parameters.description: Filter key IDs to be contained in export

parameters.name: filterKeyIdNot
parameters.description: Filter key IDs not to be contained in export

parameters.name: filterTag
parameters.description: Filter keys tagged by

parameters.name: filterKeyPrefix
parameters.description: Filter keys with prefix

parameters.name: filterState
parameters.description: Filter translations with state. By default, all states except untranslated is exported.

parameters.name: filterNamespace
parameters.description: Filter translations with namespace. By default, all namespaces everything are exported. To export default namespace, use empty string.

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description:
If false, it doesn't return zip of files, but it returns single file.
      
This is possible only when single language is exported. Otherwise it returns "400 - Bad Request" response.

parameters.name: messageFormat
parameters.description:
Message format to be used for export.
      
e.g. PHP_PO: Hello %s, ICU: Hello {name}. 

This property is honored only for generic formats like JSON or YAML. 
For specific formats like `YAML_RUBY` it's ignored.

parameters.name: supportArrays
parameters.description:
If true, for structured formats (like JSON) arrays are supported. 

e.g. Key hello[0] will be exported as {"hello": ["..."]}

post.description: Exports data (post). Useful when exceeding allowed URL size.

permittedLanguageIds.description:
Deprecated (use translateLanguageIds). 

List of languages current user has TRANSLATE permission to. If null, all languages edition is permitted.

items.description:
Deprecated (use translateLanguageIds). 

List of languages current user has TRANSLATE permission to. If null, all languages edition is permitted.

stateChangeLanguageIds.description: List of languages user can change state to. If null, changing state of all language values is permitted.

items.description: List of languages user can change state to. If null, changing state of all language values is permitted.

translateLanguageIds.description: List of languages user can translate to. If null, all languages editing is permitted.

items.description: List of languages user can translate to. If null, all languages editing is permitted.

scopes.description: Granted scopes to the user. When user has type permissions, this field contains permission scopes of the type.

items.description: Granted scopes to the user. When user has type permissions, this field contains permission scopes of the type.

viewLanguageIds.description: List of languages user can view. If null, all languages view is permitted.

items.description: List of languages user can view. If null, all languages view is permitted.

type.description: The user's permission type. This field is null if uses granular permissions

tag.description: Language tag according to BCP 47 definition

flagEmoji.description: Language flag emoji as UTF-8 emoji

base.description: Whether is base language of project

icuPlaceholders.description: Whether to disable ICU placeholder visualization in the editor and it's support.

description.example: This is a beautiful organization full of beautiful and clever people

firstFailed.description: Date of the first failed webhook request. If the last webhook request is successful, this value is set to null.

lastExecuted.description: Date of the last webhook request.

usingTranslationMemory.description: If true, new keys will be automatically translated via batch operation using translation memory when 100% match is found

usingMachineTranslation.description: If true, new keys will be automatically translated via batch operationusing primary machine translation service.When "usingTranslationMemory" is enabled, it tries to translate it with translation memory first.

enableForImport.description:
If true, import will trigger batch operation to translate the new new keys.
It includes also the data imported via CLI, Figma, or other integrations using batch key import.

usingTranslationMemory.description: If true, new keys will be automatically translated via batch operation using translation memory when 100% match is found

usingMachineTranslation.description: If true, new keys will be automatically translated via batch operationusing primary machine translation service.When "usingTranslationMemory" is enabled, it tries to translate it with translation memory first.

enableForImport.description:
If true, import will trigger batch operation to translate the new new keys.
It includes also the data imported via CLI, Figma, or other integrations using batch key import.

targetLanguageId.description: The language to apply those rules. If null, then this settings are default.

primaryService.description: This service will be used for automated translation

enabledServices.description: List of enabled services (deprecated: use enabledServicesInfo)

items.description: List of enabled services (deprecated: use enabledServicesInfo)

If null, all languages are exported

If null, all languages are exported

structureDelimiter.description:
Delimiter to structure file content. 

e.g. For key "home.header.title" would result in {"home": {"header": "title": {"Hello"}}} structure.

When null, resulting file won't be structured. Works only for generic structured formats (e.g. JSON, YAML), 
specific formats like `YAML_RUBY` don't honor this parameter.

supportArrays.description:
If true, for structured formats (like JSON) arrays are supported. 

e.g. Key hello[0] will be exported as {"hello": ["..."]}

items.description: Filter translations with state. By default, all states except untranslated is exported.

filterNamespace.description: Filter translations with namespace. By default, all namespaces everything are exported. To export default namespace, use empty string.

items.description: Filter translations with namespace. By default, all namespaces everything are exported. To export default namespace, use empty string.

messageFormat.description:
Message format to be used for export.
      
e.g. PHP_PO: Hello %s, ICU: Hello {name}. 

This property is honored only for generic formats like JSON or YAML. 
For specific formats like `YAML_RUBY` it's ignored.

includedMtCredits.description: How many credits are included in your current plan

availablePayAsYouGoMtCredits.description: The maximum amount organization can spend on MT credit usage before they reach the spending limit

extraCreditBalance.description: Extra credits, which are neither refilled nor reset every month. These credits are used when there are no standard credits

translationSlotsLimit.description: How many translations can be stored within your organization

translationsLimit.description: How many translations can be stored until reaching the limit. (For pay us you go, the top limit is the spending limit)

pdfReady.description: Whether pdf is ready to download. If not, wait around few minutes until it's generated.
